title: What can you say about the implementation of some science and technology policies and project in the Philippines? - Quora

response.answer_text: The present government is embarking on a number of science and technology projects and here are some of them; Subways - EDSA from Balintawak to NAIA and Guadalupe to Ayala.Asian Institute of Management and other schools are offering Data Management and Artificial Intelligence ApplicationsDICT and DOST is studying the use of 5G to speed up internet connectivity and ease traffic for instance.DOST is initiating a Space Agency implementing rules and regulations. Soon there will be programs associated with the use of space for science and technology.The Office of the President is supporting efforts by DOST to train more scientist and improve its facilities.There are also acquired technology in the newly purchased frigates in the use of Combat Management System. There will be various training of navy personnel handling such new technology.There are current new technologies being implemented in the agriculture sector. High yielding fruits and crops are being pursued such as F1 hybrid seeds. There are new intelligent farming equipment to increase the field productivity such as WR-801 Multi-function Hand Tractor.There are more especially in the field of medicines, electronics, chemical, energy and construction industries.

That would be wonderful! But it would be best to make a thorough research on the family dynasties here that control many things in the country, and the political climate we have. Just so you could weigh your options what could be introduced here, to improve the country. There are times when I dream of seeing aquaponics introduced here, and monolithic domes. Just a thought.
